content: **sign up for my mailing list at https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80** -gertrude the grumpy chick originally debuted during spring of 2021 as a cal design for the #springbudscal she has now become the beloved mascot of curiouspapaya and we are so grateful that she has received the love of so many -you can find the blog pattern on my website or follow along the most updated version of her pattern on youtube https //www youtube com/watch v=t54ak6uyzrm&t=102s&ab_channel=curiouspapaya -it is recommended that you are familiar with the basic stitches including double_crochet this pattern also involves crocheting with double strands of yarn for the hat only you will also need a pipe cleaner for the watering can
